name: Zoho Books Agent - Pharmaceutical
description: Comprehensive Zoho Books integration for pharmaceutical companies. Automates invoice creation, management, customer handling, and pharmaceutical-specific operations with batch tracking, expiry dates, and regulatory compliance. Handles all invoice automation tasks including creation, updates, sending, payment tracking, and customer/item management.

endpoints.description: Create a new invoice with pharmaceutical-specific fields (batch numbers, expiry dates, drug names, regulatory info). Supports all standard invoice fields plus pharmaceutical compliance tracking.

parameters.name: invoice_number
parameters.description: Custom invoice number (auto-generated if not provided)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Invoice date in YYYY-MM-DD format (defaults to today)

parameters.name: line_items
parameters.description: Array of invoice line items. Each item can include pharmaceutical fields: batch_number, expiry_date, drug_name, manufacturer, regulatory_license, storage_conditions, hazard_class, controlled_substance, prescription_required

endpoints.description: List invoices with filtering options. Supports filtering by customer, item, status, date, and pharmaceutical-specific fields.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status: sent, draft, overdue, paid, void

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Search in invoice number, customer name, etc.

endpoints.description: Get invoice details by ID including all pharmaceutical fields and line items.
Update an existing invoice. Can update any field including pharmaceutical-specific fields.

parameters.name: line_items
parameters.description: Updated line items with pharmaceutical fields

endpoints.description: Delete an invoice.
Send invoice via email to customer. Supports custom email addresses, CC, subject, and body.

parameters.name: email_ids
parameters.description: Array of email addresses to send to (defaults to customer email)

parameters.name: send_attachment
parameters.description: Whether to attach PDF invoice (default: true)

endpoints.description: Mark invoice as sent without actually sending email.
Mark invoice as paid (full or partial payment).
Create a new customer with pharmaceutical-specific fields (license number, regulatory authority, tax ID).

parameters.name: billing_address
parameters.description: Billing address object with address, city, state, zip, country, etc.

endpoints.description: List customers with search and filtering options.

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Search in customer name, company name, etc.

endpoints.description: Get customer details by ID including pharmaceutical fields.
Update an existing customer including pharmaceutical fields.

Create a new item with pharmaceutical-specific fields (batch number, expiry date, drug name, manufacturer, regulatory license, storage conditions, hazard class, controlled substance flag, prescription required flag).

parameters.name: item_type
parameters.description: Item type: sales, purchases, inventory, service (default: sales)

parameters.name: controlled_substance
parameters.description: Whether this is a controlled substance

endpoints.description: List items with filtering options.

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Search in item name, description, etc.

endpoints.description: Get item details by ID including all pharmaceutical fields.
Update an existing item including pharmaceutical fields.
Record a payment against an invoice or customer.

parameters.name: payment_mode
parameters.description: Payment mode: cash, check, credit_card, bank_transfer, paypal, etc.

parameters.name: reference_number
parameters.description: Payment reference number (check number, transaction ID, etc.)

endpoints.description: List payments with filtering options.
Get payment details by ID.
Create an estimate (quote) with pharmaceutical fields. Can later be converted to invoice.

parameters.name: line_items
parameters.description: Array of estimate line items with pharmaceutical fields

endpoints.description: List estimates with filtering options.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status: sent, accepted, declined, invoiced

endpoints.description: Convert an estimate to an invoice.
Health check endpoint. Returns connection status, API domain, organization ID, and rate limit usage.

capabilities.name: Mark Invoice As Sent
capabilities.description: Capability to mark invoice as sent
examples: Help me mark invoice as sent

capabilities.name: Mark Invoice As Paid
capabilities.description: Capability to mark invoice as paid
examples: Help me mark invoice as paid

capabilities.name: Convert Estimate To Invoice
capabilities.description: Capability to convert estimate to invoice
examples: Help me convert estimate to invoice
